Name: Martin H
Title: A Joy Ride with Mr. Kumar Company.
Review: Barat and Team to the Rescue!  I had booked/pre-paid for a car from an online company to take us from the Delhi airport to Jalandher, Punjab.  When we arrived at the airport there was no driver and no one was answering the phone. Fortunately I ran into Barat near where the chauffeurs wait and in desperation asked for help.  Luck was on our side that we met such a wonderful and honest person.  He was picking up another customer and asked us to kindly give him some time to arrange a driver for this last minute 8 hour drive.  One hour later we were in a clean car, with a wonderful driver who spoke English and knew how to expertly navigate traffic in India. Barat and Team: thank you for taking care of us when we were so tired and ensuring we safely arrived to our destination!  Highly recommend using Barat for all travels!

Name: Karel
Review: We have just completed a week in India visiting the golden triangle of Delhi,Agra,Jaipur,Delhi. Bharat has been excellent throughout from the start of booking in england by being very clear, helpful and communication was excellent. All e mails were responded to the same day or by the next day and his aim was to be helpful, and to make sure we were happy with all the arrangements.We were met at the airport by bharat and the driver promptly. The driver was excellent and has been driving for 20 years without having any accidents. He was great throughout the whole week and was a really proficient, careful driver and knew exactly where he was going at all times. Bharat also provided us with very good guides where we requested them and they were punctual and very good in their knowledge on each tour, very friendly and welcoming. Also during our Time in India Bharat kept in daily contact with us making sure all was well and responding promptly to our requests and any changes we wanted. I would highly recommend Bharat to organise your trip to India, you will not be disappointed! Thank you bharat for a wonderful week in India

Name: BHARAT KUMAR
Review: As first-time visitors to India, we had our apprehensions about getting around. But after meeting Azad and spending some time with him, we simply sat back and enjoyed the ride. He is an excellent driver, managing the chaos of India streets with skill and patience. He is friendly, answered all our questions, knew just the right restaurants, and kept the car spotless.  We’re sorry our India adventure has come to an end but we’ll keep fond memories of our great driver and would heartily recommend him to anyone planning their own India adventure.

Name: Kaahe
Title: The most convenient way to travel north India
Review: We booked Bharat for our December tour of Delhi Agra Rishikesh. When I had called to inquire, Bharat pleaded to give him business. He said times are terrible after Lockdown, death of his wife etc. etc. and he needed business. I sympathized and booked even though we were getting cheaper options.He promised excellent service. But from day 1 the services were not at par. From coming late to picking us at the airport to always complaining about his life problems, it went on and on. It got so worse that we had to tell him to shut up. We were on a holiday and didn’t want to here his woes. He was always complaining about one thing or the other.Then came the main issues. We had given him more than 25% advance and planned to give the balance when the big trip to Agra and Rishikesh would start. But he wasn’t happy about that. He kept complaining about wanting more money. We weren’t at all happy with his service and so didn’t want to give full amount incase something worse happens. We were observing him. His driving was already not trust worthy. His anger and frustration was seen in his driving. He would constantly honk which was irritating us, and when we said to honk less, he wouldn’t listen. The worse came on the 3rd day of our Delhi trip. His driving became so rough that I got very unsettled. Then when dropping us at a stop, he started driving when one of us was still getting down. The girl almost fell off the car. I was in terrible misery by then. We decided to tell him. But that backfired. When I told him we are not happy with his service all hell broke loose. He shouted at us, cursed me, abused me etc etc. On one hand he would say customers are like God to him and the very next moment he would be abusing me. I had to ask him - Do you abuse your Gods? Terrible experience. It was then that we decided that we cannot continue with this man. We discontinued his service on the spot. It was in the middle of the day, in the middle of our sightseeing trip of Delhi with our big trip to Agra and Rishikesh starting the next day, but abuse is one thing we couldn’t tolerate. In this process we lost around 6 thousand as advance that we had given him but didn’t feel like continuing with this kind of behavior. I had two minds about posting this review, but then I feel, I owe it to others who book after reading reviews from Tripadvisor. Don’t want to harm a small time business owner but this was extreme behavior on Bharat’s part.It’s the first time a good tripadvisor reviewed company was so terrible for us.

Name: BHARAT KUMAR
Title: Great Service from Car with Driver North India!
Review:
Dear Sir, 

Reading your words everybody sees your anger against me .
But everybody can also read 541 excellent reviews about my service and this  of my drivers .

The true is you are   angry because I have been obliged to stop yout trip  because you did not want to respest the payment terms and you wanted to abuse of my services.

For everyone who will read this answer, be sure your satisfaction is ours , and our  goal ,  is to continue to give our best, working  to  feed our family and give the best possible education to our girls and sons.

Name: Louisperichon
Review: Kumar was our driver. We pre booked and he was very punctual with his arrival to take us from Delhi to agra. Lovely reliable and comfortable car and refreshments were supplied to us on the journey with regular comfort breaks. Kumar took us to a lovely restaurant in Agra before leaving us at our hotel for the night.After our tour, kumar picked us up on time and transported us back to delhi.He also did us a huge favour by helping us transfer our luggage from our current hotel in Delhi to a new hotel which was more suitable.As a sceptical Englishman, I had concerns about booking a driver online, but I was so pleased that I booked Kumar. He was a professional driver with great knowledge and experience.I can’t wait to return to delhi to meet up with him again for more tours.He is the only driver I would trust.

Name: Nicholas M
Title: Dehli to Agra to Jaipur and back
Review: Mishra was awesome! He was one of the only drivers of the many I had in India that didn’t give me motion sickness. We went from New Delhi all the way to Agra and saw the Taj Mahal,  Agra Keep, then to Jaipur and saw the sights there and ended with an elephant ride. We got a guide for both Agra and Jaipur who were excellent and very informative. Mishra was fantastic, great English and lots of good advice for visitors who weren’t familiar with the area. Highly recommend Mishra, he made us feel like we had a local showing us the sights.

Name: Bharat K
Title: Perfect
Review: We just found - Car with Driver North India - on the Internet and could not have been luckier to find such professional, always perfect service to accompany our individual travel itenary. Everything was easy from remote communication back in Germany to local organsation in India. Chndar Singh was an excellent driver on the long trip days. He navigated us safely through Indian traffic, always reliable and on time picking and dropping us. The car was super comfortable and clean. Very trustworthy, always taking care of our things. Best is, hew was very well english speaking and with great knowledge. He provided us with a lot of details on life, culture and nature in India. Always having an ear for our many questions and needs. We had a lot of fun on the way. Thank you Chndar for best of best service!

Name: Irene C
Review: We booked a trip through Rajasthan with Raj (Mahavir Singh) as our driver. He is a very honest and great guy and we were glad to have him. He showed us all the important sights, and he knows about the best food places :-) with him you dont need to worry that you are tricked by other people. He always brought us safely to the next destination (even though traffic in India is a mess sometimes). It was the best ideal to travel with him. Otherwise we would have missed out on so many things (that only Indian people know) and it was very comfortable to travel in his car (AC and WiFi available). We highly recommend to contact Mahavir Singh if you consider to travel Rajasthan.

Title: Delhi to shimla then golden circle tour of Rajasthan
Review: Our experience has been fantastic, especially thanks to Shakir, who has taken us very well to the sites and has advised us wonderfully. He always said that nothing was impossible, that he could take us wherever we wanted. Going by car is definitely worth it. Getting around in a vehicle gives much more freedom than the train and allows easy access to intermediate stops. Also, having someone you can contact gives a lot of confidence. Totally recommended. Everything was very simple and easy from the first moment and until the end.
